tiers.name: Critical
tiers.description: Neon pink — Core lifeline. Must flow. If this blocks, the Hive stalls.

tiers.name: Active
tiers.description: Cyber orange — Current focus. Design, build, test, ship. Heavy lift zone.

tiers.name: Supporting
tiers.description: Neon yellow — On the periphery. Functioning or partially in progress, but not top priority. Monitored, not driven.

tiers.name: Dormant
tiers.description: Electric blue — Paused intentionally. Safe to ignore until reactivated.

tiers.name: Future
tiers.description: Dim slate — Future work, ideas, or long-term vision (2-3+ years out). Seeds waiting to grow.
